summary: Content structure is well-formed overall with good semantic organization.
details: The page uses a logical H1-H3 hierarchy with semantic regions. The main content is properly organized, but there are a few areas where the content structure could be improved for better clarity and accessibility.

issues.title: Missing H2 under main section
issues.description: No H2 found within main article content, which may impact content hierarchy and accessibility.
issues.recommendation: Add an H2 heading under the article section to properly structure the content hierarchy.

issues.title: Undefined semantic section
issues.description: The page contains a div with content that should be in a semantic element like article, section, or aside.
issues.recommendation: Replace generic div containers with semantic HTML5 elements where appropriate.
